long_description: With clever features like clear visibility panels, compression straps and extra lashing points, the waterproof, seam-sealed Blackburn Barrier Rear Pannier keeps your gear safe with tough protection. Visibility panels on exterior of pack help you locate your gear on the inside and feature a pocket for a flashing safety light (light not included). Vertical compression straps secure gear for transport, and extra lashing points offer versatility for bike touring. Waterproof roll-top design protects gear under harsh conditions, and 20L capacity offers room for everday items, a change of clothes or a bag of groceries. Zippered exterior pocket stores small items and protects them from splashes. When used with a Blackburn Interlock Bike Rack (sold separately), the Blackburn Barrier Rear Pannier can be locked to bike with a single key.
short_description: With clever features like clear visibility panels, compression straps and extra lashing points, the waterproof, seam-sealed Blackburn Barrier Rear Pannier keeps your gear safe with tough protection.
